author: Eric R. Olson
title: Episode 1 | Love
text: 14985   2365944649 cove 14985   Spy Creatures explore the rarely seen emotions of animals, revealing if they are as strong and complex as our own. Join the “spycams” as they are accepted into a wild dog pack, witness elephant love, and are mourned by a troop of monkeys. 2017-02-01 20:00:00 publish 2017-03-01 23:55:00 March 1, 2017 disabled show false 14982     2017-02-08 00:00:00 http://www.pbs.org/wnet/nature/files/2017/01/mezzanine_302-480x270.jpg 2365945961 cove 14980 'Spy Sloth' Meets Real Sloth A robotic camera reveals why you don't want to hug a sloth. http://www.pbs.org/wnet/nature/spy-wild-nature-mini-series-spy-sloth-meets-real-sloth/14980/ 2017-02-08 20:00:00 http://www.pbs.org/wnet/nature/files/2017/02/mezzanine_414-480x270.jpg 2365945972 cove 0 SHARES
